Introduction

Lee Soonkyu, known under her stage name Sunny, is a South Korean-American singer-songwriter and entertainer formerly under SM Entertainment. She is best known as one of the lead vocalists of the girl group Girls' Generation.

Sunny debuted as a member of Girls' Generation in August 2007, which went on to be one of the best-selling artists in South Korea and one of South Korea's most popular girl groups worldwide. Besides her group's activities, Sunny has participated in numerous side projects, including original soundtracks, television variety shows, musical acting, and radio hosting.
